original: Klaening, Nils-Håkan Ludvig, disponent, Boras, f. 18/7/05 i Fivelsta, östergötl. 1., av postmast. Bernhard Kläning o. Märta Lindström. — Stud:-ex. i Malmö 23, Malmö handrgymn. 25. Anst. v. Hellefors Bruks A-B 25-28, v. A-B Svenskt Konstsilke 29-43, disp. i Borås Band- & Hängslefabr. A-B sed. 44.
translated: Klaening, Nils-Håkan Ludvig, manager, Boras, born on July 18, 1905 in Fivelsta, östergötl. Son of postmaster Bernhard Kläning and Märta Lindström. - Secondary school diploma in Malmö in 1923, Malmö Handrgymnasium in 1925. Employed at Hellefors Bruks A-B from 1925 to 1928, at A-B Svenskt Konstsilke from 1929 to 1943, manager at Borås Band- & Hängslefabr. A-B since 1944.
